creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning with wide embroidered randa; white ground with wide bands of zoomorphic figures alternating with narrow bands of chevrons; patterning fills upper 3/4 of garment; designs are predominantly red with green, blue, orange, yellow and magenta diamonds and stripes.
medium: Cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
